column4: hello...i just installed my first linux distro, and was wondering if someone could point to a website where I can get my bearings straigt?
i don't even know how to install apps! haha
Check out things like the wiki and forums from ubuntulinux.org, the tutorials on linux.org, wander Google, and ask in here.
I'd never seen, much less used, Linux until last August, and I know I'm not the only one, so don't feel bad about being new to it all.
